member.summary: The animation will be applied to the whole human.

member.summary: The animation will be applied to the upper part of the human.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.AnimationMask.LowerPart
member.summary: The animation will be applied to the lower part of the human.

member.summary: The animation will be applied to the face only.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.AnimationMask.FaceExceptMouth
member.summary: The animation will be applied to the face except the mouth.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.AnimationMask.AllExceptMouth
member.summary: The animation will be applied to the whole human except the mouth.

member.name: T:AweSDK.Scene.Human
member.summary: A class for creating a human.

member.summary: Create a Human instance by loading a JSON data.
member.param: The JSON format data to load.
member.returns: A task that returns a Human instance.

member.name: T:AweSDK.Scene.Human.BaseInfo
member.summary: Basic information for human.

member.name: T:AweSDK.Scene.Human.Gender
member.summary: Enumeration type for human gender.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.#ctor(AweSDK.Core.Context,AweSDK.Scene.Human.BaseInfo)
member.summary: Construct a Human instance with a context and a base information.
member.param: The base information for the human.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.ExportToJson
member.summary: Export the Human data to JSON format.
member.returns: A task that returns a JSON string.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.SetBaseInfo(AweSDK.Scene.Human.BaseInfo)
member.summary:
Set the base information for the human. A base information includes the required , FaceMapping, and FaceTarget, and optionally, BodyMapping. FaceMapping, FaceTarget and BodyMapping are all set to the relative file paths (relative to the configured resource or cache paths). The BodyMapping is only used when the specified body mapping is needed.
You may also save the processed head skin mapping file and body skin mapping file to the same directory as the FaceMapping file. Their filenames are formed by taking FaceMapping's filename and inserting the corresponding tags. When both files exist at the same time, they will be automatically loaded.
For example,
if the FaceMapping is named:
mapping/human101.jpg
then the head skin mapping should be named (with the _head_skin tag inserted):
mapping/human101_head_skin.jpg
and the body skin mapping should be named (with the _body_skin tag inserted):
mapping/human101_body_skin.jpg
accordingly.
member.param: The base information for the human.
member.exception: The FaceTexture or FaceTarget of is null or empty. Or the Gender value of the is invalid.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.GetBaseInfo
member.summary: Get the human's base information.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.WearUnderwear(System.String[])
member.summary:
Wear the underwear. Pass an empty array or null to take off.
Note that if there is an underwear of the same type in the list, the later underwear will replace the earlier one.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.GetUnderwear
member.summary: Get the weared underwear.

member.summary: Wear the hair. Pass an empty string or null to take off.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.GetHair
member.summary: Get the weared hair.
member.returns: The weared hair. Returns an empty string if no hair is worn.

member.summary: Wear the shoes. Pass an empty string or null to take off.

member.summary: Get the weared shoes.
member.returns: The weared shoes. Returns an empty string if no shoes are worn.

member.summary: Get the weared glasses.
member.returns: The weared glasses. Returns an empty string if no glasses are worn.

member.summary: Wear the facial hair. Pass an empty string or null to take off.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Human.GetFacialHair
member.summary: Get the weared facial hair.
member.returns: The weared facial hair. Returns an empty string if no facial hair is worn.

Wear the outfits. Pass an empty array or null to take off.
Note that if there is an outfit of the same type in the list, the later outfit will replace the earlier one.

member.summary: Get weared outfits.

member.summary: Construct a HumanTimeSlice instance with a human.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.HumanTimeSlice.SetTTS(AweSDK.Scene.TTSData)
member.summary:
Set the tts data.
[Discussion]:
When using value as [id],
you should save the audio file as [id].wav,
the mouth animation file as [id]_teeth.anim,
the face animation file as [id]_expression.anim,
and optionally the audio json information as [id]_audio_info.json.
If you want to control the playback of the sound yourself, you can specify as False, otherwise True.
If you want to control the mouth animation yourself, you can specify as False, otherwise True.
If you want to control the face animation yourself, you can specify as False, otherwise True.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.Restore
member.summary: Restore the timeline from the interruption. This method is usually called automatically at the end of an interrupt, and in most cases the developer does not need to call it manually.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.SetEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set the timeline enabled or not.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.Destroy
member.summary: Destroy this timeline in order to set it to the destroyed state. This operation will also destroy all time slices.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.GetDuration
member.summary: Get the duration of the timeline in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.BeforeSeekingTime(AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.SeekTimeCallback)
member.summary: Set callback for the timeline before each seeking time.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.AfterSeekingTime(AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.SeekTimeCallback)
member.summary: Set callback for the timeline after each seeking time.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.SeekTime(System.Single)
member.summary: Set play position in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.GetSeekTime
member.summary: Get the play position in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.Pause
member.summary: Pause the timeline playing.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.Resume
member.summary: Resume the timeline playing.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.Play
member.summary: Play the timeline.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.Stop
member.summary: Stop the timeline playing. The timeline playing position will be set to 0 and stopped.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.SetLoop(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set loop count of the playing. Pass negative value or to enable infinite loop.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.AddTimeSlice(AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice)
member.summary: Add a time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.RemoveTimeSlice(AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice)
member.summary: Remove the time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.RemoveTimeSliceById(System.String)
member.summary: Remove the time slice by id.
member.param: The time slice id to remove.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.RemoveAllTimeSlices
member.summary: Remove all time slices from the timeline. This operation will not destroy any time slice. Use DestroyAllTimeSlices instead if you prefer to destroy them.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.DestroyAllTimeSlices
member.summary: Destroy all time slices.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Timeline.Reset
member.summary: Reset the timeline. This operation will REMOVE (not DESTROY) all time slices.

member.name: T:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSliceAlignType
member.summary: An enumeration to describe how to align two time slices.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSliceAlignType.StartToStart
member.summary: Align start time to start time.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSliceAlignType.StartToEnd
member.summary: Align start time to end time.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSliceAlignType.EndToStart
member.summary: Align end time to start time.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSliceAlignType.EndToEnd
member.summary: Align end time to end time.

member.name: T:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice
member.summary: An abstract base class of a time slice. A time slice is a description of the behavior of an over a range of time on the .

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.AlignTo(AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice,System.Single,AweSDK.Scene.TimeSliceAlignType)
member.summary: Align time value to another .
member.param: The time slice to be aligned.
The aligned time offset in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.IsAligning
member.summary: Whether is aligning to other .
member.returns: True if is aligning to other TimeSlice, otherwise False.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetAligning
member.summary: Get the TimeSlice that is aligning.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetAligningRoot
member.summary: Get the root that is aligning. The root is the first one in the alignment chain.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.Unalign
member.summary: Unalign the time value.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetAligned(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all time slices aligned to this. Set recursive value to True to get all the time slices of the whole alignment chain.
member.returns: All the time slices aligned to this.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.ClearAligned(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clear all time slices aligned to this. Set recursive value to True to clear all the time slices of the whole alignment chain.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.ClearTags
member.summary: Clear all tags.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.RemoveTag(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a tag.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.HasTag(System.String)
member.summary: Whether the time slice contains a tag.
member.returns: True if the time slice contains this tag, otherwise, False

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.AddTag(System.String)
member.summary: Add a tag to the time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetAllTags
member.summary: Get all tags owned by this time slice.
member.returns: All tags owned by this time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.Destroy
member.summary: Destroy this time slice in order to set it to the destroyed state. This operation will also remove itself from the timeline.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.OnActive(AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.ActiveCallback)
member.summary:
Set the callback to be called when the time slice changes from an inactive to an active state.
The callback function will be passed in the relative time offset value (in seconds) at the time of entering the active state.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.OnInactive(AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.InactiveCallback)
member.summary: Set the callback to be called when the time slice changes from an active to an inactive state.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.IsActive
member.summary: Whether the time slice is in active state.
member.returns: Return True if the time slice is active, otherwise False.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetElement
member.summary: Get the corresponding to this time slice.
member.returns: The corresponding to this time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetStartTime(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the start time in seconds.
member.exception: This TimeSlice is being bound to another one

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetStartTime
member.summary: Get the start time in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetDuration(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the duration in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetDuration
member.summary: Get the duration in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetEndTime(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the end time in seconds.
member.exception: The end time is less than the start time.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetEndTime
member.summary: Get the end time in seconds.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set whether the time slice is enabled.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.IsEnabled
member.summary: Whether the time slice is enabled.
member.returns: Return True if the time slice is enabled, otherwise False.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetPosition(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3)
member.summary: Set the position in this time slice. Pass null to unset.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetPosition(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Set the position in this time slice.
member.param: The x component of the position.
The y component of the position.
The z component of the position.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetPosition(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3,AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3)
member.summary: Set the position change in the time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetPosition(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3,AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3,AweSDK.Scene.Easing)
member.summary: Set the position change with easing in the time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetPosition(AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.ValuePosition)
member.summary: Get the position value set to the time slice. Specify the to get the corresponding value.
member.returns: The position value. Return null if the position is not set.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetRotation(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3)
member.summary: Set the rotation in this time slice. Pass null to unset. The rotation value is Euler angle in degree.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetRotation(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Set the rotation in this time slice. All values are Euler angle in degree.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetRotation(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3,AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3)
member.summary: Set the rotation change in the time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.SetRotation(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3,AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3,AweSDK.Scene.Easing)
member.summary: Set the rotation change with easing in the time slice.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.GetRotation(AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.ValuePosition)
member.summary: Get the rotation value set to the time slice. Specify the to get the corresponding value.
member.returns: The rotation value. Return null if the rotation is not set.

member.summary: An enumeration to indicate the value position.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.ValuePosition.Start
member.summary: The start value.

member.name: F:AweSDK.Scene.TimeSlice.ValuePosition.End
member.summary: The end value.

member.name: T:AweSDK.Scene.Element
member.summary: An abstract base class for scene elements.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.#ctor(AweSDK.Core.Context)
member.summary: Construct an Element instance with a context.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.Destroy
member.summary: Destroy this element in order to set it to the destroyed state. The element will be removed from the parent, and all its children will be destroyed too. In addition, all the time slices of this element will also be destroyed.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.AddChild(AweSDK.Scene.Element)
member.summary: Add a child element.
member.exception: The child element is itself, or the child element is destroyed.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.RemoveChild(AweSDK.Scene.Element)
member.summary: Remove the child element.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.Remove
member.summary: Remove from the parent.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.RemoveAllChildren
member.summary: Remove all child elements.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.GetParent
member.summary: Get the parent.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.GetPosition
member.summary: Get the position value.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.SetPosition(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Set the position value to (x, y, z).
member.param: The x component of the position.
The y component of the position.
The z component of the position.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.SetPosition(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3)
member.summary: Set the position value.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.GetRotation
member.summary: Get the rotation value. The value is an Euler angle (pitch, yaw, roll) in degree.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.SetRotation(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Set the rotation value to an Euler angle in degree.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.SetRotation(AweSDK.Core.Values.Vector3)
member.summary: Set the rotation value. The value is an Euler angle (pitch, yaw, roll) in degree.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Element.SetVisible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set whether the element is visible or not.

member.name: T:AweSDK.Scene.Transaction
member.summary: A transaction is a logical unit of work that combines one or more operations. These operations are treated as one execution unit, and subsequent operations are executed only after the current transaction has been successfully applied. The moment the callback (if any is provided as an argument to the method) is executed is the moment the transaction is done.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Transaction.Start
member.summary: Start a transaction.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Scene.Transaction.Commit(System.Action)
member.summary: Commit a transaction. If a callback is set, the callback method will be executed after the transaction ends.

member.name: T:AweSDK.ErrorReporter
member.summary: An error reporter collects error messages.

member.summary: Set or get app key.

member.name: P:AweSDK.Authorization.LicenseManager.AppSecret
member.summary: Set or get app secret.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Authorization.LicenseManager.GenAuthString
member.summary: Generate the code needed for authentication.

member.name: M:AweSDK.Authorization.LicenseManager.GenAuthStringAsync(System.Single)
member.summary: Request the code needed for authentication from the backend.
